name: #Think Before You Twirp
description:
Birds aren't real! You don't believe me? Why would I be lying to you? Go test your knowledge and check your facts quickly, before they delete it! What are you waiting for? Go, GO!🐦

A tiny game made for Digital Games Prototyping class @MUNI by Lea Belejová using Flickgame.

Inspired by the Birds Aren't Real movement, be sure to check them out.
